## ghissue

Bulk-upload GitHub Issues

### Examples

```
GITHUB_TOKEN='...' ghissue create ./issues.txt
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help           help for ghissue
      --token string   GitHub personal access token
```

### SEE ALSO

* [ghissue create](ghissue_create.md)	 - Create Issues from file
